name: Song of Life
description: This is a short visual novel that was created by only a few people. It's about a guy named Leon. He finds a mysterious amulet that sends him back in time. Now in his hands is his own and the fate of people close to him.  The game has a lot of music, various references, and a pinch of romance. All the backgrounds and characters were drawn with love especially for this story. In any case, we will be glad if you like this work.
